message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm happy to answer any questions you have. I'm asking for $15,000 for it.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product at such a high price. I am looking for a more reasonable price given my budget constraints. Would it be possible for us to negotiate down to $10,000?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but the product is very valuable. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget and the value of the product to me, could we possibly agree on $11,000?
